Convert an rtable object to a string

Source: R/tt_toString.R
toString-VTableTree-method.Rd

Convert an rtable object to a string

# S4 method for VTableTree
toString(x, widths = NULL, col_gap = 3)

Arguments

x

table object
widths

widths of row.name and columns columns
col_gap

gap between columns

Examples

library(dplyr)

iris2 <- iris %>%
  group_by(Species) %>%
  mutate(group = as.factor(rep_len(c("a", "b"), length.out = n()))) %>%
  ungroup()

l <- basic_table() %>%
  split_cols_by("Species") %>%
  split_cols_by("group") %>%
  analyze(c("Sepal.Length", "Petal.Width"), afun = list_wrap_x(summary) , format = "xx.xx")

tbl <- build_table(l, iris2)

cat(toString(tbl, col_gap = 3))
#>                  setosa       versicolor      virginica  
#>                 a      b       a       b       a      b  
#> ---------------------------------------------------------
#> Sepal.Length                                             
#>   Min.         4.4    4.3      5      4.9     4.9    5.6 
#>   1st Qu.      4.8    4.8     5.6     5.6     6.2    6.3 
#>   Median        5      5      5.9     5.9     6.5    6.5 
#>   Mean         5.02   4.99   5.99    5.88     6.5    6.67
#>   3rd Qu.      5.3    5.1     6.4     6.1     6.7    7.2 
#>   Max.         5.8    5.7      7      6.7     7.7    7.9 
#> Petal.Width                                              
#>   Min.         0.1    0.1      1       1      1.4    1.5 
#>   1st Qu.      0.2    0.2     1.2     1.2     1.9    1.8 
#>   Median       0.2    0.2     1.3     1.3     2.1     2  
#>   Mean         0.23   0.26   1.35     1.3    2.08    1.98
#>   3rd Qu.      0.2    0.3     1.5     1.4     2.3    2.2 
#>   Max.         0.4    0.6     1.8     1.7     2.5    2.5
